top_comments.comment: There is something magical about the way you say “ Hey guys and welcome back to my YouTube channel”. It sets a mood for me ❤️✨

comments_since_last_sample.body: So just out of curiosity who is playing for the food and plush hotel rooms ...plane tickets ...Clearly you have anxiety to even finish your school and Shane doesn't look like he works and your tube earnings won't be able to pay off all the bills 🙄
